content.value:
This is promising. The 3 miscarriage rule is brutal. After my 1st & most traumatic miscarriage which involved surgery I had a complete mental breakdown. Had I known that I needed to experience that twice more I think I'd have given up hope completely.
 
theguardian.com/society/2021/j…
